com.genband.kandy.api.access

Interface IKandyAccess


  • public interface IKandyAccess
    This interface represents the methods of a registrationService.

    Registration service are used for:

    • registering/unregistering to/from the server
    • getting registration state, and for getting already registered services
    Success and failure callback are handled by the RegistrationListener interface.

      • login

        void login(KandyRecord user,
           String password,
           KandyLoginResponseListener listener)
        This method connect user to server
        Parameters:
        user - The username value that are used in registration process.
        password - The password value that are used in registration process
        listener - The callback that will be invoked

      • login

        void login(String userAccessToken,
           KandyLoginResponseListener listener)
        This method connect user to server with user token
        Parameters:
        userAccessToken - The use access token string
        listener - The callback that will be invoked

      • logout
